head.title: Home - Linton-Stockton School Corporation

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span: The Mission of the Linton-Stockton School Community is to develop productive citizens committed to life-long learning in an ever-changing society.

All Linton-Stockton citizens...including students, parents, taxpayers, and all employees...are members of the "school community." Learning is a life-long process. Everyone is a teacher and a learner. Education is fundamental to a quality life in a free society. Education requires commitment. Schools must be willing to change to meet the needs of society.
